mapper.select: select repno, bno, rewriter, recontent, regdate, uptodate from breply where bno = #{bno} order by repno
mapper.insert: insert into breply (repno, rewriter, recontent, uptodate) values (reply_bno.nextval , #{rewriter}, #{recontent}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update breply set rewriter = #{rewriter}, recontent = #{recontent}, uptodate = sysdate where repno = #{repno} and bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: delete breply where rep = #{repno} and bno = #{bno}
